Name: Starsation
About the game: Starsation is a space shooter game made in voxel graphics. In the game you have to wander through the vastness of space, accompanying our planet. You need to help her avoid all the asteroids that fly into her, shooting them from afar, collecting coins along the way, for which you can open new universes and galaxies. Earth's satellite Moon is your assistant in this. It can also shoot down asteroids if it is in the right place at the right time. The whole game is accompanied by pleasant music that dispels the emptiness of space. Good luck on your space adventures, Earth Defender!
